page.title: 12 GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {Ball-tick }is a{game}we play in the {street. }You need a small rubber or sponge ball to play. One person is {"on." }They take the ball and the other players run. The person with the ball takes three steps and stops. The player with the ball tries to hit one of the others. If you are hit you are{"on." }If the ball misses, the person who is on chases after the ball and the game goes on. {Donkey}is played with a ball against a wall. You throw the ball against the wall and you jump over it. If it doesn't hit you the next person has a go. When it touches you, you are given the letter D, the next time the letter O until you get all the letters from the word Donkey and then you're out.
